source_description: F088 FinishedGoods Creation UX - Add Finished Goods tab to Catalog mode following F087 layout pattern. Implement ttk.Treeview list view, create/edit form with Foods (FinishedUnits), Materials (MaterialUnits), and Components (nested FinishedGoods) sections. Category filters + type-ahead search for component selection. Service layer enhancements for atomic creation/update with circular reference validation.
